blog.name: justincorrectmarvelquotes
blog.title: I Swear They Said it
blog.description: "Act up, you can get smashed up." -City Girls

summary: Peter don't know how, but he is stuck on the ceiling.
question: Peter don't know how, but he is stuck on the ceiling.
answer:
“Mr. Stark!” Peter cried from the living room ceiling, his hands and toes almost conjoined to the plaster. He had gone up there to squash a bug and figured out that his fingers had stuck to it. At first, it came off as normal. Every so often, Peter’s limbs would get sticky and somehow attach to the surface he was on as a safety mechanism. He would always be able to detach himself though and get down or off without too much pain.

But for some reason, this time, his body didn’t want him to unstick. He tried hard to pull his socks away from the ceiling, only to get a little off before it started to throb.

“Mr. Stark!” He shrieked one more time, soon hearing footsteps racing to his room. He witnessed the door swing open and Tony emerged, in his nanotech undersuit.

“What is it?” He asked, urgently getting ready to press his chest plate. He quickly dropped his hand though as Peter was nowhere to be seen.

“Up here,” Peter called, trying to pull up a hand to wave in his direction. Tony looked up towards his voice and frowned. “I thought you were dying.” He said dryly, slinging off his sweatshirt and tying it around his waist. “Are you stuck?”

Peter nodded slowly, trying once again to get his feet free. To no avail though. “This has happened before.” He informed the engineer, as the man got a stool and stood on it, getting level with Peter’s face. He reached up and started to pull at the kid’s hand, trying to rip it free.

“Ow ow ow, okay stop!” Peter called, swatting Tony’s hand away as soon as he felt his skin rip. “That isn’t going to work.”

Tony huffed and got off the stool, putting his hands on his hips, in thought. This was tricky.

“I call the doctor.” He announced, taking out his phone and immediately going into his contacts.

“We need to get him to calm down,” Stephen said, once he was over there and examine the stuck boy.

“How do we do that?” Tony asked, crossing his arms. His worry began to show over time as he stood under Peter in case he suddenly fell without warning.

“What calms you down, Peter?” Stephen asked, rising to look into Parker’s eyes. Peter thought for a moment and nodded silently.

“Okay, I think I got it.” He said, and Stephen descended back to the ground to give Peter some room. Peter closed his eyes and took in a deep breath, trying his best to clear his mind. Tony watched intently, getting ready to catch the boy if need be. The cloak was also at the ready. Suddenly Peter became unstuck and fell right into Tony’s arm, making him fall over as well, the cloak quickly caught the both of them before they did too much damage.

“Nice one, Pete,” Tony said, a little out of breath. Peter smiled sheepishly as he got to his feet, helping Tony to his as well.

“What had thought of?” Stephen asked as the cloak returned to his shoulders. Peter went silent once again and kicked the ground nervously.

“Never Gonna Give You Up, by Rick Astley.” He mumbled. 

Tony sighed exasperatedly and pressed his hand to his face.

blog.name: natashastarkotp
blog.title: NatashaStark
blog.description:
Trying to keep tonynat alive. Y’all sleeping on a power couple here.

Header made by @kelslk-art

IronWidow focus but ships Tony with pretty much everyone else so expect some other pairings. She/Her.

summary:
Daisy: anyway, why are we talking about me? What’s going on between you and Natasha?
Tony: nothing. She’s a respected...
body:
Daisy: anyway, why are we talking about me? What’s going on between you and Natasha?

Tony: nothing. She’s a respected colleague.

Daisy, unconvinced: uh-huh.

Tony: we both don’t have time to pursue a relationship. She’s been working really hard and doing an amazing job with the Accords, they’re too important and she can’t be distracted right now. Natasha’s a remarkable woman, she’s a valued friend, she’s…standing right behind me isn’t she?

Natasha: don’t let that stop you.

*she leans over him, flirtatiously*

Natasha: keep digging.


/————————/

Again inspired by delicate, by @queeenpersephone go check it out guys!!

blog.name: ironmanstan
blog.title: i dont think ill ever sleep again
blog.description: mer - 19 - CET - FAQ & TAGS - writing - ship buckytony - discord servo - tracking tag #ironmanstan

summary: also while im dishing out. yall love to say how tony is the egotistical arrogant one and how steve is right to call him out on...
body:
also while im dishing out. yall love to say how tony is the egotistical arrogant one and how steve is right to call him out on it when in canon, tony reduces to nothing but babbling praise out of respect when in earshot of a science expert he admires and has the luck and privilege to meet (helen cho & bruce banner in mcu, shuri and many more in comics) and when steve first has a one on one with tony - canonically among the smartest ppl in mcu - he immediately questions his worth outside the suit as if the suit fell from the sky and wasnt thought up and built in a cave with spare parts and an expiration date stamped on tonys heart, by tony. or, or when steve refused to even think about the possibility of preparing for an alien attack cause gosh darn it his clean n clear heart will save us all. or, my personal favorite, when he decided that he alone knows better than reps of 117 countries concerned for their own safety.

and then yall go “but if tony was a realistic billionare alive rn youd hate him” yes, i absolutely would, but if we’re being stupid and applying realism to comic book characters, id hate some american self entitled asshole soldier whos excuse for wreaking havoc on civillians and their property was him playing catch with his bff + who thinks hes smarter than the rest of the world and has the right to decide whether to intervene or not wherever he wants just as much. maybe tony isnt the one with his head up his ass, js lol

summary: Oh look, I’m crying...
body:
Oh look, I’m crying…

So I was explaining to my parents (who don’t really know much about Marvel) some of the theories about how the avengers are going to deal with half the universe being snippety snapped out of existence, and I said that the main theory is that they’re gonna to get the time stone, reverse time and, subsequently, the effect of the snap. I also explained that some people say that as a result of this, Tony will be erased from existence.

My mum legit looked me dead in the eye as if it was completely obvious and said;

“But that’s impossible, Iron Man’s done so much for their world that nothing would be the same without his impact.”

And she’s right; I’ve mulled over this for so long and my uneducated (in terms of fan theories and superheroes) mother literally nailed it in one sentence.

summary: youd be a futurist too if your past was a trauma inducing shitfest of betrayal and desperation and false hope and your present...
body: youd be a futurist too if your past was a trauma inducing shitfest of betrayal and desperation and false hope and your present filled with people uninformed about the concept of preparation over reparation that exists for a reason, mind you. tony clings to hope cause hes too experienced to cling to borderline idiotic faith in the universe and the power of friendship when it comes at the expense of regular people who dont get the luxury of choice. im sorry but if i say i think tony is the only valid person in mcu i say it for a good reason

summary: Hey, guys! Since my post teasing a draft of a social media AU got wayyyyy more notes than I expected, I'm happy to say the first...
body:
Hey, guys!

Since my post teasing a draft of a social media AU got wayyyyy more notes than I expected, I’m happy to say the first two chapters of the fic has been published!

It’s very short for a first chapter, so I decided to publish the second (the one I showed you guys) at the same time.

Here it is!

summary: The Masked Avengers
title: The Masked Avengers
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2UtRJFD

by that_one_kid

Tony Stark, CEO of Stark Industries and financial backer for the Avengers, has a secret. So do his bodyguard, his personal assistant, a Stark Industries lab tech, a Stark Industries R&D art designer, and that guy who just wants his hammer.

But a few things are about to come to light.

Words: 2580, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Clint Barton, Natasha Romanov/Natalie Portman, Steve Rogers, Hulk, Bruce Banner, Pepper
  • Relationships: pre Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, Clint Barton/Phil Coulson, Clint Barton & Natasha Romanov, Natasha Romanov/Pepper Potts
  • Additional Tags: Secret Identity, Only it’s all of them, They’re called the Masked Avengers, and they’re a goddamn mess, identity reveals, AU Where they all work at StarkTech, But no one knows who anyone is

summary: Tree Sitting
title: Tree Sitting
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2TvW9j1

by sUNkIsSt

The Guardians have a mission on a fire planet that is too dangerous for Groot. They decide to leave him with Tony Stark for a few (okay maybe more than a few) hours.

Needless to say, Tony isn’t exactly impressed.
